scenario_text.value:
Still in the classroom?
You’re not going to look around?

As if! Some messed-up monsters are skulking
around out there, right?!
Sure, but Kunemon’s here to protect you.
You gotta be kidding me!

You and that alligator thing might be all
buddy-buddy, but I don’t get this thing!
I’m not an alligator!
Hmph... Disgusting...
(Ryo looks pretty worried...)
Can’t let that slide.
He’s not wrong.

Don’t be so insulting.
He’s in this mess too, after all.
Say what? You bump your head or something?
This thing is just some freakin’ monster!

I bet these things have some ulterior motive
for trying to follow us around!
Hey, we do NOT!

...I can’t say I completely disagree with
that suspicious side of yours, Ryo.

Caution and even a healthy level of cowardice
help keep you safe from danger.
Uh, Takuma?!

Still, have a little bit of faith.
Hasn’t Kunemon done any good for you?

...Hmph.
A loudmouth as always.
